Title: Relates to prohibiting county correction officers from dispensing medications to incarcerated individuals on the premises of a local correctional facility
Summary: Prohibits county correction officers from dispensing medications to incarcerated individuals on the premises of a local correctional facility; provides that corrections officers or staff may dispense or administer medications during a medical emergency.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to prohibiting county correction officers from dispensing medications to incarcerated individuals on the premises of a local correctional facility
